summary: This file improves the expression of a female character, and a motion of a mouth.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]

This file improves the expression of a female character, and a motion of a mouth.
[color=#fff000]*except for Argonians, Khajiits, and orc.
[color=#fff000]*This mod does not make your character beautiful.[/color][/color]

This mod to change the following files:

eyesfemale.tri
femalehead.tri
eyesfemaleleft.tri
eyesfemaleright.tri
femaleheadbrows.tri
femaleheadmaskleftside.tri
femaleheadmaskrightside.tri
mouthhumanf.tri

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Change log:[/b][/color][/size]

[size=3][b]2017.12.07 - ver 2.0    Reduced movement of eyebrows and mouth[/b][/size]

2013.11.02 - ver 1.5    Change femalehead.tri(Weight slider fix)
2013.05.15 - ver 1.4    Change mouthhumanf.tri, femalehead.tri, and mouthhumanf.nif(Optional)
2013.05.14 - ver 1.3    Minor changes(femalehead.tri and mouthhumanf.tri)
2013.05.14 - ver 1.2    Minor changes(mouthhumanf.tri)
2013.05.13 - Add optional file
2013.04.29 - ver 1.1    Change expression 16 "Combat Shout" and some minor changes
2013.04.27 - ver 1.0    Release

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Recommend:[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44596]Mfg Console[/url]
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/75951]Fix Lip Sync[/url][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]﻿
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34346]Smile in HD[/url]

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Compatible:[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
[color=#fff000]*It can also be used for character mods and race mods with a separate file by using the tri file of vanilla.

[b][color=#c69e9e][size=6]Incompatible:[/size][/color][/b][/color]
[color=#ffffff][b]
[/b][/color]"Realistic Teeth" and all MOD that changes teeth meshe.
[color=#ffff00]*Maybe ... I have not confirmed. Compatible only if you change the texture of teeth.
[/color]
[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]

Copy the Data folder into (install folder)Skyrim
[color=#fff000]*Please back up if there is a file with the same name already exists.[/color]

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/color][/size]

Remove 8 files that were installed with this mod.

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Optional File:[/b][/color][/size]

Minor Changes of teeth and eyes meshes.(UV and Translation)
[color=#ffff00]*[/color][color=#fff000]Recommend: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34346]Smile in HD[/url] by zzjay
*If you want to adapt to the NPC, to export the "facegendata" in the CreationKit(Ctrl+F4), or directly editing the "facegendata".[/color]

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Q&A:[/b][/color][/size]

Q. I used the shout but look like the Preview's image not play me.
A. "Expression16 - Combat shout" it will not be played even if you shout in the game. Shout to lip-sync properly. I've never seen only in mfg command "Expression 16". I do not know why. To ask Bethesda.

Q. Will this mod fix the bug with NPCs mouths staying open after speaking to the player?
A. Don't fix. This mod is only changing the expression of feelings and shape of the mouth when pronouncing. Facial animation has many bugs 1.9 or later.

Q. Lip-sync is delayed.
A. It's a bug in 1.9 or later. To ask Bethesda.

Q. Nothing happens when using the "mfg command".
A. Command of "Phoneme" and "Modifier" does not work 1.9 or later. To ask Bethesda.

Q. Plans to make the male version ?
A. I think I'll also make male version, I think it will take a while.

Q. Plans to make the beast race version ?
A. Sorry, I can not make it because I've never seen in the real beast is to talk or change the expression. I think beast race is cool enough to remain for now.

Q. Can you upload your character?
A. I don't have a save data of this character(She is a NPC), and can not make also preset. Because i directly edit the vertex in the blender. There is also a possibility to make a follower mod, But there will be other now.

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]How to double-sided display the eyelashes:[/b][/color][/size]

1. Open eyesfemale.nif in Nifskope.
2. Select "BSLightingShaderProperty" in "NiTriShape".
3. Check the box "SLFS2_Duble_Sided" of "Shader Flags 2" in "Block Details"

[url=https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/35303/35303-1512578167-1987026961.jpeg]*Sample Image[/url]

4. Save(Player character you already have a save data is double-sided display in this.)
5. Make the character in the game(or CreationKit). If you want to adapt to the NPC, to export the "facegendata" in the CreationKit(Ctrl+F4), or directly editing the "facegendata".

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Permission:[/b][/color][/size]

[color=#ffffff]You are not allowed to upload this file to other sites under any circumstances.
You are not allowed to modify my files, including creating bug fixes or improving on features under any circumstances.
You are not allowed to convert this file to work on other games under any circumstances.
You are not allowed to use assets from this file in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms.
[/color][color=#ffff00][size=4]You are allowed to use any of the assets in this file, But you must write the credit in your description.
No need to contact me. [/size][/color]

[size=6][color=#c69e9e][b]Special Thanks:[/b][/color][/size]

[color=#fff000]tktk - Fixed skinnyMorph(Femalehead.tri).
Bethesda Softworks and all fan this game.

[/color]
author: nao4288
